recipes.name: Spinach Chickpea Curry
recipes.instructions: 1. Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until translucent. 2. Add spices (cumin, turmeric, salt, pepper) and cook for 1 minute. 3. Add chickpeas and spinach, cook until spinach is wilted and chickpeas are heated through.

recipes.name: Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: 1. If using dried fava beans, soak them overnight and cook until tender. If using canned, rinse and drain them. 2. In a bowl, mash the fava beans with minced garlic, diced green bell pepper, diced roma tomato, and diced red onion. 3. Add tahini, extra virgin olive oil, cumin, salt, and black pepper to the mixture. Mix well to combine. 4. Adjust seasoning with cayenne pepper to taste. 5. Serve the Ful Medames warm or at room temperature, optionally with whole-grain pita bread on the side.

recipes.name: Lentil Soup
recipes.instructions: 1. Sauté diced onion, carrot, and celery in olive oil until softened. 2. Add lentils and water (4 cups). Bring to a boil, then simmer for 20 minutes until lentils are tender. 3. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
